entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CounterSet.CreateCounterSetInstance can stack overflow with excessive counters #110843
  • [browser][ST] trimming #110840
    10.0.0
  • exception on binding WPF BitmapImage and german umlauts are used in file names (dotnet 9.0.0 / windows 11) #110838
  • Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) in threads.cpp #110837
  • Crash in ILC in the CI #110836
  • Segmentation fault on linux after upgrading from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110835
    10.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Improve build time on Apple mobile #110833
    10.0.0
  • possible null ref in SignatureHelper #110832
  • Weird performance numbers for Generics with class constraint and .net9 regression #110831

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Record equality compare collection content only #110806
  • Step Over sometimes executes a lot more than one statement #109885
    9.0.x
  • Better Retry Mechanism Test For Networking failures #34419
  • Debugging Issue VS 2022 .net 9 #110841
  • ``PersistedAssemblyBuilder`` generates invalid IL when loading fields with generic type parameters #110247
    10.0.0
  • `foreach` will jump to other code in `dotnet9` #109812
    9.0.x
  • Step becomes a "go" in .NET 9 #109785
    9.0.x
  • Dotnet Runtime Issue 12520 (Linux Path.GetDirectoryName with UNC paths) #110834
  • More Unicode character information (such as script) #37366

PullRequests

Created

  • Add specialized FrozenSet implementations for byte and char #110842
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110839
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.x

Merged

  • Add vector support to System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives.LeadingZeroCount for Byte and Int16 #110333
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • Remove unsafe code from IPAddress #110824
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling. #110732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110665
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Support generic fields in PersistedAssemblyBuilder #110372
    bug, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • Fix comments in `Latin1CharInfo` #110829
    area-System.Globalization
  • Remove uses of DECODE_RETURN_KIND part of GCInfo #110799
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix `IDE0004` for object comparison #110206
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Conditionally check the compiler flags in libs.native #109556
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Tweak `EncodeToUtf16_Vector128` #110203
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, needs-area-label
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Add `ccmp` and enable conditional compares for X64 #110826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Generalize parameter register to local mapping in the backend #110795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GetNormalizedLength on iOS and similar platforms #110723
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Simplify usage of the installer and shared framework SDKs based on improvements in the tooling #109710
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update System.Speech to also recognize Speech_OneCore #110123
    area-System.Speech
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser] Add `OutputType=Library` tests #110731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #110695
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110628
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Remove HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext caching #110626
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110765
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110764
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • Fix for "ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: _Uaarch64_setcontext" when doing build for FreeBSD-arm64 using internal libunwind #110432
    os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: Include more edges in `BlockDominancePreds` to avoid a JIT crash #110568
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.2
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid array allocation in Task.WhenAll? #110777
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix C++/CLI applications which use __declspec(appdomain) #110495
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND/NF feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Enable inlining for late devirtualization #110827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift bindings] Enable real signing of experimental NuGet package #2897

Closed

  • [SwiftBindings] ValueWitnessTable needs some changes #2881

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift Bindings] Ensure projection tooling generate bindings that compile for selected frameworks #2900
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Disable `SharedLibrary.csproj` in official build #2899
  • [Swift bindings] Enable test signing for experimental NuGet binding package #2898
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add the `WasmComponentTypeWit` item group #2859
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [Swift bindings] Add bindings experimental NuGet to the dotnet-experimental feed #2878
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Emit type debug info into a single module #2883

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On `dotnet new classlib` instead of creating a useless `Class1.cs` create a file named after the directory the file was created in. #45568
  • Restore error for exe that references exe #45557

Closed

  • Change default behavior for the commands that require nuget.org #44312
    10.0.1xx
  • NETSDK1060 Error when build in linux #25605
  • Automate workload drop creation to streamline insertion process #36442

PullRequests

Created

  • Look up the target OS for crossgen2 using the full target RID #45566
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • [WIP] Checking how many tests fail #45559
    untriaged
  • Use emojis for stage and job display names #45558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' with arcade #45563
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45561
    untriaged
  • Setup binskim globbing to artifacts/bin w/ workaround #45462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #45564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry-pick 44859 into release/9.0.2xx: Fix failing tests because of "UseUwpTools" property #44882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #45115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix identity of MSTest item templates #45562
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Hardcode manifest name when building source-only #45554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not automatically add nuget.org as a package source when it is absent from nuget.config Fixes #44312 #45410
    untriaged, Area-Templates

Updated

  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support Interactive without setting verbosity explicitly in dotnet tool restore Fixes #22987 #45312
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, untriaged
  • Don't publish assets with Vertical visibility as part of the merged manifest for a vertical. #45553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable signing in the VMR official pipeline #45517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • (Draft) Remove `SlnFile` #45442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't require there to be a supported runtime pack runtime identifier for crossgen2 #45487
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Port a set of test fixes from main to 9.0.2xx #45549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn on :: use in dotnet new install towards #45422 #45552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make assembly version logic more robust Fixes #44042 #45518
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update Helix queues to osx.15.amd64|arm64 #45543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable in Main Directory.Build.Props, Add #nullable disable to .cs Files, and Clean Up Redundant Configurations #45522
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate
  • Support package@version syntax in dotnet new install, partial fix for #45422 #45545
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Split tests by method rather than class #45520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Spam. #8900

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Edit speclets to distinguish features already delivered from potential future enhancements #8098

PullRequests

Merged

  • Edit pass on C# 10 speclets #8901

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [MemberNotNull(When)] annotations don't work on local functions inside member initializers inside non-static closure chains #76528
  • "Requires `unsafe` context" error in an `unsafe` iterator #76514

Closed

  • Inline type hints are reduplicated #76527
  • No ability to disable fading for unused private methods analyzer #76396
  • Collection expressions generate collection with a base type instead of derived #76515
  • IDE0130 false positive in extension method files. #76484
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35618.83 #76513

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations during checksum creation. #76524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow users to define EmbeddedAttribute #76523
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't introduce prebuilts for 8.0.10 packs when building source only #76517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify inline hint tagging and fix duplicated tags. #76525
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76387
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review, VSCode, Next
  • Include AdditionalFiles doc #76526
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add an option to control if unused members shoudl be faded out. #76520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode, Next
  • Allow OmniSharp to provide ImplementType Options #75312
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • In addition to persisting the elfie index as a txt file, persist it as a binary file #76509
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove blocking sync calls in rename #76521
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove sync over async blocking in sig change #76519
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch all of 'end construct' over to jtf. #76504
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove sync over async blocking in Extract Method/Interface options code #76510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Switch to jtf in brace completion #76512
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix sync over async blocking in tools|options #76511
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove sync over async calls from within rename #76508
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove blocking async calls from sig-change #76507
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove legacy signature help interaction code. #76495
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Propagate marked attributes from primary constructor parameters to backing fields. #76475
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only target NetCurrent for source build #76505
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove scope variance exceptions #76296
    Area-Compilers
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add option for choosing stdio as the LSP communication channel #76437
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Restricting Users to a Single Circuit in Blazor Server #59576
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop #59573
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, single_query, updates #59572
  • Blazor streaming rendering responses should expose a custom header indicating that streaming takes place #59571
  • openAPI Document Generation doesn't include endpoints outside of Program.cs #59570
  • [Interactive Server] State persistent doesn't work with navigation #59569
  • MapStaticAssets issue on .net 9 Asp.Net Core Blazor Auto Mode #59565
  • "dotnet new webapiaot" should include OpenAPI support #59564
  • Endpoint filter factory was called twice. #59562
  • HealthCheck add possibility to cache checks and protect API from DDOS attacks #59561
  • Minimal API: TypedResults, Problem, ValidationProblem #59560
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries #59558

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #59559
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot #58066
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_spring #57969
  • Perf improvement: json_spring, plaintext_spring #57747

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #55674

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update dotnetbuilds CDN to new endpoint #59575
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Skip tests on internal queues too #59574
    area-infrastructure
  • Small fix around getting options when retrieving OpenAPI routes in a case-sensitive manner #59568
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59359
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Update testing analyzers #59516
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fixed ownership mapping for the routing area #59556
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Removed unused areas #59548
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Correct typo in ProtectedPersonalDataAttribute.cs & PersonalDataAttribute.cs #58664
    area-identity, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Only generate specified document (#59097) #59535
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, feature-openapi, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use the live crossgen2 corresponding to the runtime we're building against #59551
    area-infrastructure
  • perf: get rid of MemoryStream in `KeyRingBasedDataProtector` #59322
    area-dataprotection, Perf
  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • Add AuthN/AuthZ metrics #59557
    area-security
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59348
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor WASM standalone] Avoid caching `index.html` during development #59349
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fixed Bug 59396 for Camel/Compliant casing. #59545
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-networking
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.OpenApi 2.x and support OpenAPI v3.1 #59480
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • don't throw a misleading exception upon a BadHttpRequestException #58688
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 10.0-preview1
  • Redis distributed cache: add HybridCache usage signal #59543
    area-middleware
  • [release/2.3] Fix Mvc.FunctionalTests referencing RazorPagesClassLibrary #59361
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Note fire-and-forget status of HubConnection event tasks #57779
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • feat: DefaultOutputCachePolicyProvider added #57362
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Update C# code for #29448 #56086
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Nested Editor<T> Null Reference Exception. Fix a bug in the HtmlFieldPrefix.cs:23 #58888
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • U #26736
  • Flyout Items Not Displayed in RightToLeft FlowDirection on iOS in Landscape Orientation and Hamburger Icon Positioned Incorrectly #26726
  • Image Picker stuck on iOS with .NET 8 #26721

Closed

  • [MAUI] I5_ EmptyView - No string is shown in the three 'EmptyView String' pages #26663
    .NET 9 SR3
  • App crashes when you clear a group's record in CollectionView #20819
  • Custom controls for complex type properties must be wrapped with layout to work #25236
  • Local resources not working in release configuration with more than one resource inside #26206
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Mac Catalyst does not support resizing or repositioning windows programmatically #9704
    .NET 9 SR3
  • BindableLayout.ItemsSource no longer works in 8.0.61 #23491
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • .Net Maui Crash OnResume #26601
  • The RealParent on Syncfusion.Maui.PdfViewer.SfPdfViewer has been Garbage Collected. #26666
  • tutorial(macos): Fresh XCode 16.2 errors out when trying the Run with Debug step #26686
  • Android-CollectionView - MeasureFIrstItem breaks layout #21778
  • Android - CollectionView scroll wrong item when set animation is false #26191
  • NavigationPage navigation on Android without Shell yields java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: No destination with ID 2 is on the NavController's back stack. The current destination is Destination(0x1) class=crc6452ffdc5b34af3a0f.NavigationViewFragment #26375
  • [iOS] App Freezes When Pressing Return Key in Editor with Text Binding to Entry #26341
  • BindTapGesture shows error in .net 9 #26088

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migration dropping wrong Foreign Key on entities with same name but differemt schemas #35358
  • Could not load assembly 'Name'. Ensure it is referenced by the startup project 'Name' #35356
  • Regression in the translation of `SqlConstantExpression` #35355
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Queries on primitive collections cannot be translated when using a compiled model #35273
  • Query: SqlConstantExpression should have ctor which takes value and type #25943
    9.0.0
  • Consider removing support for collections of primitives typed as object array/list used in parameters to queries #35332
  • Column name mismatch when adding new derived type to TPH #35352

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35239 - EF9: SaveChanges() is significantly slower in .NET9 vs. .NET8 when using .ToJson() Mapping vs. PostgreSQL Legacy POCO mapping #35360
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't scaffold NonNullableConventionState annotation #35359
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix SqlConstantExpression obsolete constructor #35357
  • WIP on ConvertingValueComparer #35354

Merged

  • Basic setup of dev container. #35351

Updated

  • Translate COALESCE as ISNULL #34171
  • Fix to #35239 - EF9: SaveChanges() is significantly slower in .NET9 vs. .NET8 when using .ToJson() Mapping vs. PostgreSQL Legacy POCO mapping #35326
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
